scripts.test-ico: concurrently -k --success first "npm run ganache -- --quiet" "npm run clean-folders && truffle test ./test/ico.js"
scripts.test-claim: concurrently -k --success first "npm run ganache -- --quiet" "npm run clean-folders && truffle test ./test/claim.js"
scripts.test-forbidden: concurrently -k --success first "npm run ganache -- --quiet" "npm run clean-folders && truffle test ./test/forbidden.js"
scripts.test-staking: concurrently -k --success first "npm run ganache -- --quiet" "npm run clean-folders && truffle test ./test/staking.js"
scripts.test-staking-refactory: concurrently -k --success first "npm run ganache -- --quiet" "npm run rebuild && truffle test ./test/staking-refactory.js"
scripts.test-swap: concurrently -k --success first "npm run ganache -- --quiet" "npm run clean-folders && truffle test ./test/swap.js"
scripts.migrate-local: npm run clean-folders && npm run migrate-local-01 && npm run migrate-local-02 && npm run migrate-local-03 && npm run migrate-local-04 && npm run migrate-local-05 && npm run migrate-local-06
scripts.migrate-local-01: npx env-cmd -f .env.local npm run clean-folders && truffle migrate -f 1 --to 1
scripts.migrate-mumbai: npx env-cmd -f .env.local npm run clean-folders && truffle migrate --network=mumbai
scripts.migrate-mumbai-01: npx env-cmd -f .env.local npm run clean-folders && truffle migrate --network=mumbai -f 1 --to 1
scripts.migrate-neon: npm run clean-folders && truffle migrate --network neon_devnet
scripts.migrate-neon-01: npm run clean-folders && truffle migrate --network neon_devnet -f 1 --to 1
scripts.migrate-neon-02: npm run clean-folders && truffle migrate --network neon_devnet -f 2 --to 2
